title: How to Make a Berry and Banana Smoothie

methods.name: Making a Strawberry and Banana Smoothie

steps.headline: Peel the two bananas.
steps.description: Slice out any bruises. Then, either cut the banana into small pieces or break into small chunks.

steps.headline: Blend the bananas, strawberries, milk and yoghurt together in a blender.
steps.description: You can also add finely grated orange zest if you wish. Turn the blender to a high power for one minute, or until the mixture is completely frothy or smooth.

steps.headline: Transfer to a serving glass and serve immediately.

methods.name: Making a Blueberry, Raspberry Sherbet and Banana Smoothie

steps.headline: Place the bananas, blueberries, raspberry sherbet, frozen yogurt and berry juice into the blender.
Blend together until well mixed.
steps.description: If the blender is laboring, it will need more liquid, so add a little more of the berry blend juice.

steps.headline: Add the ice cubes.
steps.description: Blend to combine the ice well.

methods.name: Making a Paleo Berry and Banana Smoothie

steps.headline: Place the ingredients into the blender.
Blend together until well combined and smooth.

methods.name: Making a Raspberry, Banana and Avocado Smoothie

steps.headline: Place the ingredients (apart from the milk) into the blender or food processor.
Add the sweetener in the amount you prefer.
Transfer to a serving glass.
steps.description: If the smoothie seems to thick, thin it down a little with some milk. Serve immediately.

text: Making a Strawberry and Banana Smoothie Peel the two bananas. Slice out any bruises. Then, either cut the banana into small pieces or break into small chunks. Blend the bananas, strawberries, milk and yoghurt together in a blender. You can also add finely grated orange zest if you wish. Turn the blender to a high power for one minute, or until the mixture is completely frothy or smooth. Transfer to a serving glass and serve immediately. Enjoy! Making a Blueberry, Raspberry Sherbet and Banana Smoothie Place the bananas, blueberries, raspberry sherbet, frozen yogurt and berry juice into the blender.  Blend together until well mixed. If the blender is laboring, it will need more liquid, so add a little more of the berry blend juice. Add the ice cubes. Blend to combine the ice well. Pour into glasses. Serve immediately. Making a Paleo Berry and Banana Smoothie Place the ingredients into the blender.  Blend together until well combined and smooth.  Transfer to a serving glass. Serve immediately. Making a Raspberry, Banana and Avocado Smoothie Place the ingredients (apart from the milk) into the blender or food processor.  Add the sweetener in the amount you prefer. This step is optional. Blend or process until smooth.  Transfer to a serving glass. If the smoothie seems to thick, thin it down a little with some milk. Serve immediately.
